contentfulProduct.seoDescription: From working out to staying in, our organic heavyweight crew is made to go the distance. 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, overlocked seams add durability. Made from 100% organic cotton.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Heavyweight Fleece Crew
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $50

content.value: Buy any 3 activewear, downwear, cashmere or socks items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

From working out to staying in, our organic heavyweight crew is made to go the distance. 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, overlocked seams add durability, and raglan sleeves offer greater freedom of movement. Made from 100% organic cotton.
Material: 100% organic cotton 375g heavyweight fleece
Custom fabric process for a butter-soft feel both inside and out
High quality rib at neck, sleeve, and waist openings
Raglan sleeve construction for a wider range of movement
Overlock stitching at sleeve seam for added durability
Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
Model is 6'1 and wearing a size Medium
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% organic cotton 375g heavyweight fleece
  • Custom fabric process for a butter-soft feel both inside and out
  • High quality rib at neck, sleeve, and waist openings
  • Raglan sleeve construction for a wider range of movement
  • Overlock stitching at sleeve seam for added durability
  • Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
  • Model is 6'1 and wearing a size Medium

productDescription.productDescription: From working out to staying in, our organic heavyweight crew is made to go the distance. 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, overlocked seams add durability, and raglan sleeves offer greater freedom of movement. Made from 100% organic cotton.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
